abstract: Jonathan Martin reviews book Countdown to Pearl Harbor: The Twelve Days to the Attack by Steve Twomey.

headline.main: On the 75th Anniversary of Pearl Harbor, a Look Back

keywords.value: Countdown to Pearl Harbor: The Twelve Days to the Attack (Book)
keywords.name: creative_works

snippet: In “Countdown to Pearl Harbor,” the journalist Steve Twomey traces the miscommunications, faulty assumptions and foul-ups that led to the bombing....
lead_paragraph: In “Countdown to Pearl Harbor,” the journalist Steve Twomey traces the miscommunications, faulty assumptions and foul-ups that led to the bombing.
